articles.title: This outgoing CEO has net worth higher than fortunes of Tim Cook, Satya Nadella - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Snowflake chief executive Frank Slootman will be succeeded by Indian-American computer scientist Sridhar Ramaswamy.
articles.content: Frank Slootman, the outgoing chief executive officer (CEO) of US-based data cloud firm Snowflake, is wealthier than both Apple's Tim Cook and Microsoft's Satya Nadella, according to Bloomberg Billion… [+1694 chars]

articles.title: Where is the best place to see the 2024 eclipse? 7 spots in New Hampshire - The Boston Globe
articles.description: The highly anticipated Great North American Solar Eclipse — which will send a lunar shadow sweeping across the US on April 8 — is expected to bring a wave of visitors to the Granite State.
articles.content:
Five weeks from now, for about three and a half minutes, the mid-afternoon sun over New Hampshires Great North Woods will be totally obscured by the moon.
The highly anticipated Great North American… [+3398 chars]

articles.author: IANS
articles.title: Sleep Disorder linked to memory, cognition risks - Telangana Today
articles.description: The study, slated for presentation at the American Academy of Neurology’s 76th Annual Meeting in April, indicates an association and doesn't assert that sleep apnea directly causes cognitive decline.
